Product Development+Research and Develop.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of designs that receive approval from stakeholders.
Measures the average time taken from the initial design phase to market launch.
Product Development+Research and Develop.FORMULA: Total Time from Design Completion to Market Launch

Product Development+Research and Develop.EXPLANATION: Measures the number of iterations a design undergoes before final approval.
Measures how well the actual costs of design adhere to the budgeted costs.
Evaluates the overall quality of the design based on various quality criteria.
Measures the average customer satisfaction score for vehicle designs.
Product Development+Research and Develop.FORMULA: (Sum of Customer Feedback Ratings on Designs / Number of Customers)

Product Development+Research and Develop.EXPLANATION: Assesses the level of innovation in vehicle designs.
Product Development+Research and Develop.FORMULA: (Number of Innovative Features in Designs / Total Designs) * 100

Product Development+Research and Develop.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of designs that successfully transition to the prototype phase.
Product Development+Research and Develop.FORMULA: (Number of Designs Transitioned to Prototypes / Total Designs) * 100
